show.title: Marupiravi
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/cXfMNV
show.description:
Ira is a cunning and selfish woman. She takes advantage of Ayaan's love and seizes all his wealth. But Ayaan is reborn—this time with only one goal: to take revenge on Ira.
Will Ayaan be able to teach Ira a lesson she’ll never forget? And will he finally find true love?
show.description_secondary:
Ira is a cunning and selfish woman. She takes advantage of Ayaan's love and seizes all his wealth. But Ayaan is reborn—this time with only one goal: to take revenge on Ira.
Will Ayaan be able to teach Ira a lesson she’ll never forget? And will he finally find true love?
